title: Recreational Open Spaces up to 8% shall be allowed
clause_text: Recreational Open Spaces up to 8% shall be allowed. 3)Requirement of open spaces shall be as per the Regulation No 41(5)
section: 33(15) - Development of land earmarked for the MHADA/Mill Workers Housing under Regulation No 35.
